name: Customize Website Colors
description: Forces all websites to use a dark grey background and light grey text for nighttime viewing by default, but you can use this to make all websites use the colors you want! Some things may stay the colors they are supposed to as Stylus' !important's don't take priority over the website's ones, an error in my opinion. If this style is enabled, colors will be hard to customize. Disable this before editing the foreground and background color.

user.name: Xane Myers (Xane_MM)
user.about: I'm the developer of Magical Mary 1! I've also created userstyles in the past but I haven't updated them in forever. (They might not work as a result.)

style_setting_options.label: No
style_setting_options.value: *, div, span { background-color: /*[[bgcolor]]*/ !important; color: /*[[fgcolor]]*/ !important; filter: none !important; border-color: /*[[fgcolor]]*/ !important; box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 0 transparent !important; text-shadow: -1px -1px 0 /*[[fgcolor]]*/ !important; opacity: 1 !important; }

style_setting_options.label: Yes
style_setting_options.value: *, div, span { background: none /*[[bgcolor]]*/ !important; color: /*[[fgcolor]]*/ !important; filter: none !important; border-color: /*[[fgcolor]]*/ !important; box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 0 transparent !important; text-shadow: -1px -1px 0 /*[[fgcolor]]*/ !important; opacity: 1 !important; }

style_setting_options.label: None
style_setting_options.value: /* No borders are around scripted "buttons" and links. */

style_setting_options.label: Dotted
style_setting_options.value: a, a:hover, a:focus, a:selected, a:active, a:visited { border: 1px dotted /*[[fgcolor]]*/ !important; }

style_setting_options.label: Solid
style_setting_options.value: a, a:hover, a:focus, a:selected, a:active, a:visited { border: 1px solid /*[[fgcolor]]*/ !important; }
